name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube comments in Sidebar while watching

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show YouTube comments on the right of the video. Read comments while you watch videos!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See YouTube comments next to the video. Read comments as you watch!
Want to read comments while watching a YouTube video? Fed up with scrolling or pausing to read comments? 

We have a solution.

Comments now show up beside the video player, and suggested videos are below the video player.

Show YouTube comments on the right of the video. Read comments while you watch videos!
